body:
Files: src/compiler/js-operator.{h,cc}, src/compiler/js-generic-lowering.cc

JS operators relevant to with-scope and lookup:
- JSOperatorBuilder::CreateWithContext(ScopeInfoRef) -> IrOpcode::kJSCreateWithContext
  Defined in js-operator.cc:1505..; declaration in js-operator.h:1115

- No dedicated JSLoadLookupSlot/JSStoreLookupSlot operators exist; lookup slot loads/stores are represented as JSCallRuntime nodes using javascript()->CallRuntime(Runtime::kLoadLookupSlot[InsideTypeof]) and kStoreLookupSlot_*.

- ToObject: JSOperatorBuilder::ToObject() is a cached op (CACHED_OP_LIST) and used by JSGenericLowering::LowerJSToObject to Builtin::kToObject.

JSGenericLowering handling:
- LowerJSCreateWithContext(Node* node): inserts ScopeInfo param and replaces with Runtime::kPushWithContext call.
  In js-generic-lowering.cc:
void JSGenericLowering::LowerJSCreateWithContext(Node* node) {
  ScopeInfoRef scope_info = ScopeInfoOf(node->op());
  node->InsertInput(zone(), 1, jsgraph()->ConstantNoHole(scope_info, broker()));
  ReplaceWithRuntimeCall(node, Runtime::kPushWithContext);
}

- Lookup slot operations lowering: there are no separate IR ops; by the time GenericLowering runs, loads/stores of lookup slots are already represented as JSCallRuntime with Runtime::kLoadLookupSlot / kLoadLookupSlotInsideTypeof, or StoreLookupSlot_*; JSGenericLowering::ReplaceWithRuntimeCall keeps them as runtime calls by building a Call to the runtime CEntry.

- Fast-paths vs runtime calls for globals and named/keyed access are handled in other lowerings, but lookup slot ops remain direct runtime calls (no IC-based fast path), except for context/global lookup bytecodes which in BytecodeGraphBuilder may create fast paths and only fallback to runtime for extensions.

Other related definitions:
- JSOperatorBuilder::HasContextExtension(depth), LoadContext, LoadScriptContext, StoreContext, StoreScriptContext are used to build context ops (fast-paths) and are eliminated in typed lowering; Generic lowering marks them UNREACHABLE.

- js-graph.h/cpp provide JSGraph helpers like ConstantNoHole, but no special helper for lookup slots; CallRuntime is used universally.
explanation: This entry clarifies the JS operator layer and generic lowering behavior for with-scope creation and lookup slot operations. It identifies that CreateWithContext is a first-class JS op that gets lowered to Runtime::PushWithContext. Lookup slot operations do not have dedicated JS ops and are represented as JSCallRuntime to specific Runtime:: functions. ToObject is a generic operator and lowered via builtin. It also references context load/store ops used for fast paths and eliminated later.
file_line: js-operator.cc:1505-1525; js-operator.h:1115; js-generic-lowering.cc: LowerJSCreateWithContext; ReplaceWithRuntimeCall; UNREACHABLE context ops.
